remarks: A specialized lemma for set theory (to derive the Axiom of Pairing). (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 13-May-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 5-Jan-2013.)
statement:
prlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( et <-> ch ) ) $.
prlem1.2 $e |- ( ps -> -. th ) $.
prlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ( ( ( ps /\ ch ) \/ ( th /\ ta ) ) -> et ) ) ) $.
